page.title: 15CUBS
page.content: Cubs meet every Thursday at 6.30-8.00. We have 5 leaders who are called Akela (the leader),Rikki,Kaa(who does the football training),Harty and Bageera. These names are from the Jungle Book,by Rudyard Kipling. Cubs was founded by Baden Powell in 1907. The uniform consits of a green jumper(with all your badges on),black or grey trousers,a red and yellow neckachief(the colour our pack)and a green cap. We can work for different badges and we get 5 when we join cubs. In the Summer we can do soccer practice and we try to get into the cubs football team. We train every Wednesday night from 6.30 to 8.00. The cubs football season starts around September and finishes in about May. We got to the semifinals. We do outings and camp at cubs.
